objects.text:
• Super solution for biggest,
   brightest bubbles
• Eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic
• Hours of fun for kids ages 3+

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner features a playful and energetic design ideal for a kid-focused product. The background is a diagonal gradient blending deep violet (#8A2BE2) and royal purple (#6A0DAD), enhanced with layered semi-transparent glowing bubbles to add depth and motion. On the left side, large bold title text layers (`heading_1` and `heading_2`) use eye-catching white and bright yellow fill colors respectively, emphasizing the product name energetically. A tagline (`tagline`) in neon green introduces the product's promise, followed by brief descriptive bullet points (`description`) in clean white text. The price (`price`) is prominently highlighted in vivid yellow, while a green call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with clear white text (`cta`) invites immediate shopping. On the right, a high-resolution product image (`product_image`) balances the composition.

**Color Palette:**
- Violet: #8A2BE2  
- Royal Purple: #6A0DAD  
- Bright Yellow: #FFEB3B  
- Neon Green: #9BFF9B  
- Leaf Green: #4CAF50  
- Pure White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image uses a playful and vibrant color palette that emphasizes fun and energy, ideal for attracting children and families. The prominent colors are fluorescent green (#7DF08E) in the liquid, which creates a lively and fresh feel. The label’s background features a bold purple (#9246C7), which contrasts with the yellow (#FFD700) used in the word "BUBBLES" for a striking highlight. The word "Gazillion" is bordered in blue (#3549A4) and green (#A3E039), with an orange outline (#FD6F23), making the text pop. Bubbles in soft pastels blend across the label, adding a whimsical, airy touch perfect for an advertisement banner.
